channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Possible Water Leak, 25th September
item.description:
It looks like a new bit of Pavement has a water leak. North bound side of the road, before the Roubdabout.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Springbank Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Narrow footpath, 25th September
item.description:
The footpath that runs through the park adjacent to Greatfield park school is now extremely narrow. The tarmac path is intact x2 the width of what’s showing but the grass and weeds have not been edged properly for a number of years. This causes issues with bikes, mobility scooters and wheelchairs users when passing in opposite directions. Please can this be edged back to the full width of the original tarmac path and edge which is currently hidden from view.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Selworthy, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole slow Lane M5 Southbound just before A40 junction, 25th September
item.description:
Deep pothole before A40 junction on the M5 southbound in the slow lane, passenger side. Unavoidable in heavy traffic. I hit it hard yesterday driving at approx 65mph Sunday September 24th at around 3.00pm. Looks like it’s been there a while and has been reported numerous times already. I stopped at the next services, 5-6 miles further on to check wheel and tyres. Passenger side front tyre damaged with blister. Need to check alloy wheel as potentially damaged. Photographs taken.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary lights out, 25th September
item.description:
Temporary traffic lights not working
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole affecting nearside wheels in lane 1 approximately 1 mile before exit for j11, 24th September
item.description:
Large pothole affecting nearside wheels in lane 1 approximately 1 mile before exit for j11. I hit this in the dark and the whole car shuddered. I have a four wheel drive with large wheels and am unsure what damage has been caused to my suspension. Driver's of cars with smaller wheels need to be extra vigilant because hitting this at motorway speed is dangerous. It was not safe for me to stop and investigate so I am unable to comment on size and depth.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned road traffic signs in Upper Park Street, 24th September
item.description:
Abandoned traffic cone and men at work sign have been here for months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Park Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very very loud manhole cover, 24th September
item.description:
As cars pass over the incorrectly fitting metal manhole cover it makes a very loud noise capable of keeping local residents awake at night. Please adjust the cover so that it is seated properly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Swindon Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post in pavement, 23rd September
item.description:
Contractors have installed a new post right in the middle of the pavement forcing wheelchair and prams users into the road. The position of this pole is ridiculous and dangerous, it needs to be moved or removed immediately.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, All Saints Villas Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Debris in gutters, 23rd September
item.description:
Gutter and roads require cleaning

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 137, Hewlett Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 23rd September
item.description:
Deep pothole before Jct 10 on the M5 southbound in the slow lane. I hit it yesterday Oct 22nd around 7.45pm and have damage to my front passenger alloy.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drains/gulleys, 22nd September
item.description:
Today's rain has exposed blockage of 2 more drains; location: outside Nos 254/256 and 270.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 374, Old Bath Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath blocked, 22nd September
item.description:
Footpath next to busy A40 crossing blocked & unable to be used. Used heavily by infant, junior, primary & secondary school children. no work going on all week (see photo taken at 3pm). should have been finished on 15/09.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sinking/collapsing manhole/inspection/chamber cover, 22nd September
item.description:
This metal cover has been sinking progressively over a period of months and is struck by almost every vehicle travelling southwards over Pilley Bridge - whether left and up Old Bath Road or right into Charlton Lane. It seems likely that it will collapse completely; with darkening mornings and evenings, a hole of this size would cause serious damage and/or an accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 200, Old Bath Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Badly damaged and potentially hazardous paving, 22nd September
item.description:
The paving stones immediately outside F Hinds the Jewellers on the Lower High Streer, close to Bennington Street, are badly damaged and very precarious. It appears that large vehicles have been mounting the pavement but none of the businesses there are aware of such behaviour. There are a lot of quarter/half solit paving stones in the area and they have been particularly weakened

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 231, High Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Plastic barrier dumped on verge, 22nd September
item.description:
I reported this week's ago, but only one was removed. I've now pulled this out of the grass that was growing through it. Can it be collected please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7-12;14-21, Princess Elizabeth Way, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Verge not mowen, 22nd September
item.description:
The verge in New Barn Lane alongside Lexington Square has not been mowed this year . Getting very long and untidy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, New Barn Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 21st September
item.description:
Flooding road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Folly Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faded white H lines, 21st September
item.description:
The lines were installed to provide safety for those using the public footpath Prestbury church/Southam, and to prevent blocking of access to residential homes in Shaw Green Lane. Since 18/07/2023 refreshment of the much faded lines has been repeatedly requested to Highways and Byways and the appropriate form submitted. To date no action has been taken. The lines have faded due to increased heavy traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 65, Shaw Green Lane, Prestbury, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Branch blocking footpath in wooded area, 21st September
item.description:
Blown down branch still attached to tree is causing a problem negotiating public footpath in small wooded area between fields.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bentley Lane, Southam, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple deep potholes, 21st September
item.description:
There are 4 deep potholes at the top end of Oakland Avenue. Large stones from the subbase are coming out over the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Oakland Avenue, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
